doc:
John Steel (singer) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Steel_(singer) 0 John W. Steel (January 11, 1895 – June 25, 1971; sometimes referred to as John Steele) was an American tenor. He was featured in the Ziegfeld Follies of 1919 and 1920 and Irving Berlin's Music Box Revues of 1922 and 1923. John_W._Steel ( January_11_,_1895 – June_25_,_1971 ; sometimes_referred to as John_Steele ) was an_American_tenor . He was_featured in the_Ziegfeld_Follies of 1919_and_1920 and Irving_Berlin 's_Music_Box_Revues of 1922_and_1923 .
